title: NW - ZADIE SMITH - tall sans serif
content:
Looking for an ID on the tall sans serif used for this Zadie Smith novel

Many thanks in advance!  
Dann

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004523im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NorthWest_5631.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [NorthWest.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004523/http:/typophile.com/files/NorthWest.jpg) | 104.09 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: It looks like **[Poster Sans (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004523/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/k-type/poster-sans/)** by K-Type
